title: CSAF provider metadata
description: Representation of metadata information of a CSAF provider as a JSON document.

json_url_t.title: JSON URL type
json_url_t.description: Contains a URL of a JSON file.

provider_url_t.title: Provider URL type
provider_url_t.description: Contains a URL of a provider-metadata.json.

canonical_url.title: Canonical URL
canonical_url.description: Contains the URL for this document.

distributions.title: List of Distribution
distributions.description: Contains a list of used distribution mechanisms.

items.title: Distribution
items.description: Contains the information of a used distribution mechanism.

directory_url.title: Directory URL
directory_url.description: Contains the base url for the directory distribution.

rolie.title: ROLIE
rolie.description: Contains all information for ROLIE distribution.

categories.title: List of ROLIE category document URLs
categories.description: Contains a list of URLs which contain ROLIE category documents.

items.title: ROLIE category document URL
items.description: Contains a URL of a ROLIE category document.

feeds.title: List of ROLIE feeds
feeds.description: Contains a list of information about ROLIE feeds.

items.title: ROLIE feed
items.description: Contains information about the ROLIE feed.

summary.title: Summary of the feed
summary.description: Contains a summary of the feed.
examples: All TLP:WHITE advisories of Example Company.

tlp_label.title: TLP label
tlp_label.description: Provides the TLP label for the feed.

url.title: URL of the feed
url.description: Contains the URL of the feed.

services.title: List of ROLIE service document URLs
services.description: Contains a list of URLs which contain ROLIE service documents.

items.title: ROLIE service document URL
items.description: Contains a URL of a ROLIE service document.

last_updated.title: Last updated
last_updated.description: Holds the date and time when the document was last updated.

list_on_CSAF_aggregators.title: List on CSAF aggregators
list_on_CSAF_aggregators.description: Decides whether this file should be linked in the list of a CSAF aggregator.

metadata_version.title: CSAF provider metadata version
metadata_version.description: Gives the version of the CSAF provider metadata specification which the document was generated for.

mirror_on_CSAF_aggregators.title: Mirror on CSAF aggregators
mirror_on_CSAF_aggregators.description: Decides whether the CSAF documents can be mirrored and provided by a CSAF aggregator.

public_openpgp_keys.title: List of public OpenPGP keys
public_openpgp_keys.description: Contains a list of OpenPGP keys used to sign CSAF documents.

items.title: PGP keys
items.description: Contains all information about an OpenPGP key used to sign CSAF documents.

fingerprint.title: Fingerprint of the key
fingerprint.description: Contains the fingerprint of the OpenPGP key.

url.title: URL of the key
url.description: Contains the URL where the key can be retrieved.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Provides information about the publisher of the CSAF documents in this repository.

role.title: Role of the issuing party
role.description: Contains the role of the issuing party according to section 7 in the CSAF standard.
